A kitten's call first starts out as a high-pitched squeak-like sound when very young, but then deepens over time.
According to National Geographic,  cats can't taste sugary foods due to a faulty sweet receptor gene.
A cat can reflexively twist its body and right itself using its acute sense of balance and flexibility.
Cats are digitigrades, meaning they walk directly on their toes
As with many predators, cats have retractable claws, so don't make them angry
In ancient Egypt, the cat god, Bast, was a goddess of the home
